name: vcrpy
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.7.4" %}

package:
  name: vcrpy
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: vcrpy-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.python.org/packages/source/v/vcrpy/vcrpy-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  md5: 27fde8879e74e670fe9142a195249f2a

build:
  script: python setup.py install
  number: 1

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - pyyaml
    - wrapt
    - six >=1.5
    - mock # [py27]
    - contextlib2 # [py27]

  run:
    - python
    - pyyaml
    - wrapt
    - six >=1.5
    - mock # [py27]
    - contextlib2 # [py27]

test:
  # Python imports
  imports:
    - vcr
    - vcr.persisters
    - vcr.serializers
    - vcr.stubs

about:
  home: https://github.com/kevin1024/vcrpy
  license: MIT License
  summary: 'Automatically mock your HTTP interactions to simplify and speed up testing'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dopplershift
